{{Advert|date=June 2011}} {{Infobox |name = Infobox/doc |bodystyle = |title = VSA Partners |titlestyle = |image = [[File:VSA_Partners_logo.jpg|200px|alt=VSA Partners logo]] |imagestyle = |caption = |captionstyle = |headerstyle = |labelstyle = |datastyle = |label1 = Type |data1 = Incorporated [[Partnership]] |label2 = Industry |data2 = [[brand]]ing, [[Graphic design|design]], [[Digital media|digital]], [[advertising]] |label3 = Founded |data3 = 1982 |label4 = Headquarters |data4 = [[Chicago]], [[Illinois]], [[United States|U.S.]] |label5 = Key People |data5 = Dana Arnett
Pat Heick
James Koval
Steve Ryan
Curt Schreiber

[[Sol Sender]] | |label6 = Employees |data6 = 150 |label7 = Website |data7 = [http://www.vsapartners.com www.vsapartners.com] }} '''VSA Partners''' is an independent branding firm. VSA Partners is headquartered in [[Chicago, IL]] with offices in [[Minneapolis|Minneapolis, MN]] and [[New York City|New York, NY]]. The firm was founded in 1982 by Robert Vogele as Communication Design Group.{{cite web | title = VSA Partners | publisher = Rhodes Patterson, [[Communication Arts]], January/February 1994 | url = http://www.chicagodesignarchive.org/pdfs/comarts_vsa.pdf}} Clients include [[IBM]], [[Harley-Davidson]], [[General Electric|GE]], [[Nike, Inc|Nike]] and [[Procter & Gamble]] among others.{{cite web|title=Colasanti Joins Senior Team At VSA|url=http://www.adweek.com/aw/content_display/esearch/e3i824709c93a633dfdfa41e53f28c7f64c|publisher=Adweek|date=18 May 2010}} ==Notable work== Notable projects include: * [[Sappi|Sappi Fine Paper]] â ''Off Register'' digital, video and print campaign{{cite web|last=Elliott|first=Stuart|title=Paper Company Wants Printers to Go the âFloâ Way|url=http://www.nytimes.com/2011/01/24/business/media/24adnewsletter1.html?_r=1&scp=1&sq=sappi%20and%20vsa&st=cse|publisher=The New York Times|date=24 Jan 2011}} * Harley-Davidson â new product launch, consumer outreach; 2011 Blackline and Black Label Collection{{cite web|last=Bush|first=Michael|title=Harley Davidson Taps Three New Agencies|url=http://adage.com/article/agency-news/advertising-harley-davidson-taps-ad-agencies/147135/|publisher=Advertising Age}}{{cite web|title=Harley-Davidson official channel page|url=http://www.youtube.com/user/HarleyDavidson|publisher=YouTube}}{{cite web|title=VSA Partners official channel page|url=http://vimeo.com/vsapartners/videos|publisher=Vimeo}} * River North Dance Company â pro-bono rebranding campaign including new logo, rebranding of the dance companyâs name to River North Dance Chicago, as well as new marketing materials, including stationery, sales and marketing collateral, direct mail and advertising{{cite web|first=BWW News Desk|title=River North Dance Chicago Returns to The Harris Theater|publisher=Broadway World.com Chicago|date=11 Feb 2011}} * Mohawk Superfine Paper â ''Mode of Transformation'' promotion book.{{cite web|title=Mode of Transformation Cruises Through London|url=http://www.feltandwire.com/2010/10/22/mode-of-transformation-cruises-through-london/|publisher=Felt & Wire|date=22 Oct 2010}}{{cite web|first=Armin|title=The Best of FPO 2010, Part II: Aug â Dec|url=http://www.underconsideration.com/mt-fpo/mt-search.cgi?IncludeBlogs=1&search=mode+of+transformation|publisher=FPO|date=27 Dec 2010}} *[[CME Group]] â ''How the World Advances'' global integrated advertising campaign. Campaign includes TV, print, and online advertisements.{{cite web|title=CME Group Deputs Ad Campaign|url=http://www.btobonline.com/apps/pbcs.dll/article?AID=/20110315/STRATEGY02/303159996|publisher=BtoB Magazine|date=15 Mar 2011}} * [[Chicago 2016|Chicago 2016 Olympic bid]] and identity{{cite news | title = City's Olympic logo unveiled â a 6-pointed star | publisher = Fran Spielman, Chicago Sun-Times, September 19, 2007 | url = http://poll.suntimes.com/sports/olympics/564325,oly091907.stng | date=September 19, 2007}}{{cite web | title = Chicago's Olympic logo debuts | publisher = Brandon Glenn, Chicago Business, October 12, 2006 | url = http://www.chicagobusiness.com/cgi-bin/news.pl?id=22425&seenIt=1}}{{cite web | title = Chicago Wants the 2016 Olympics | publisher = Kelly Ennis, [[BusinessWeek]], January 2, 2007 | url = http://www.businessweek.com/innovate/content/jan2007/id20070102_000234.htm?chan=innovation_architecture_top+stories}} * [[Cingular Wireless|Cingular]] â [[Corporate identity|brand identity]] and launch{{cite book |title= Logo design workbook: a hands-on guide to creating logos |last= Adams |first= Sean |coauthors= Noreen Morioka, Terry Stone |year= 2004 |publisher= Rockport Publishers |isbn= 159253032X, 9781592530328 |pages= 218â221 |url= http://books.google.com/books?id=vbdZRuWP5kIC&pg=PA218&lpg=PA218&dq=vsa+partners&source=bl&ots=-BTz4h1I7m&sig=04kkm9Kga7C8xEvbpDsx_8aInFQ&hl=en&ei=jv4LS472CtHDlAelhaGZBA&sa=X&oi=book_result&ct=result&resnum=5&ved=0CBQQ6AEwBDgy#v=onepage&q=vsa%20partners&f=false |accessdate= December 7, 2009 }} ==External links== *[http://www.vsapartners.com/ VSA Partners Website] ==References== {{reflist}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Vsa Partners}} [[Category:Graphic design studios]] [[Category:Branding companies]] [[Category:Companies based in Chicago, Illinois]] [[Category:Companies established in 1982]]
